name: Try to create more table then numtables
setup: $TC p4template create pipeline/ptables pipeid 22 maxrules 1 numtables 2 preactions action gact index 1 postactions action gact index 2
$TC p4template create table/ptables/cb/tname tblid 22 keysz 16 keys id 1 action gact index 3 preactions gact index 4 postactions gact index 4
$TC p4template create table/ptables/cb/tname2 tblid 42 keysz 16 keys id 1 action gact index 3 preactions gact index 4 postactions gact index 4
cmdUnderTest: $TC p4template create table/ptables/cb/tname3 tblid 50 keysz 16 keys id 1 action gact index 3 preactions gact index 4 postactions gact index 4

name: Try to dump table without specifying pipeline name or id
setup: $TC p4template create pipeline/ptables pipeid 22 maxrules 1 numtables 2 preactions action gact index 1 postactions action gact index 2
$TC p4template create table/ptables/cb/tname tblid 22 keysz 16 keys id 1 action gact index 3 preactions gact index 4 postactions gact index 4
$TC p4template create table/ptables/cb/tname2 tblid 42 keysz 16 keys id 1 action gact index 3 preactions gact index 4 postactions gact index 4
cmdUnderTest: $TC p4template create table/ptables/cb/tname3 tblid 50 keysz 16 keys id 1 action gact index 3 preactions gact index 4 postactions gact index 4
matchPattern: Error: Must specify pipeline name or id.*

name: Dump pipeline with amount of table > P4TC_MSGBATCH_SIZE
setup: $TC actions add action gact pass index 1
$TC actions add action gact pass index 2
$TC actions add action gact pass index 3

$TC p4template create pipeline/ptables pipeid 22 maxrules 1 numtables 17 preactions action gact index 1 postactions action gact index 2

name: Try to create valid table without control block name
setup: $TC p4template create pipeline/ptables pipeid 22 maxrules 1 numtables 2 preactions action gact index 1 postactions action gact index 2
